version_name: 5.0.1Hey Singers!This release includes:+ Return of some popular sound effect!+ Cool new filters!+ UI improvements for enhanced recording experience!+ Clearer lyrics display!+ Awesome NEW SONGS added!+ Bug fixes!

5.0.1Hey Singers!This release includes:+ Return of some popular sound effect!+ Cool new filters!+ UI improvements for enhanced recording experience!+ Clearer lyrics display!+ Awesome NEW SONGS added!+ Bug fixes!

version_description:
Hey guys!
We are so thrilled to announce that our new version has arrived! UPDATE NOW for amazing features including:
1. PM classification function added.
2. Publishing process optimized. The recordings can be saved to local when there is no in
